name: Caveman Game :)
description:
Caveman Game :) (you have to say it with with the smily face) is a Fighting Game with Different Waves, Enemies, Obstacles and Even a Boss!

Controls: WASD (Move Around) Space (Jump) Left Mouse Button (Attack)

There are also Power Ups that can be Useful or Useless, like a Power Up that gives you Invincibility from Enemies or another one that Increases Enemy Spawning
